001AFF3A.VoiceDir5.AAE9B: he tries to ground himself here from the emotional intensity. shuddering breath

2B06128F.Line7.AAE9B: She was days away from finishing her apprenticeship. I had a staff fashioned for the occasion. Almost buried it with her. But it didn’t seem right.

9111990D.Line5.AAE9B: You have? Oh, spirits. Thank you. Truly. I...

C4FA8C11.Line9.AAE9B: Here. I think she’d want to see it put to good use. Not rotting in the ground.
